page.title: 16SWIMMING
page.content: My hobby is swimming.I have the choice of two pools, the {LISNAGELVIN {POOL} near my school or the one at { {TEMPLEMORE SPORTS COMPLEX.}I go swimming every Tuesday and Thursday.I can do four different strokes, the breast_stroke,the back-stroke,the front_crawl and the butterfly.Also I have just learned to dive. I like to swim in deep water. At present I am practising for my twenty_five metre badge.I enjoy going to the pool with my friends because we can play different games.The pool is designed like a kidney_shape,there is a steep slide which spirals down into the water.This is fixed to the bottom of the pool in the shallow end.A special feature which this pool has is a { {wave_making machine.}The sound of a horn tells us that the machine has been turned on.
